content: **gingerbread man ornament** add a touch of holiday charm to your christmas decor with this crochet gingerbread man ornament pattern this quick and simple tutorial will show you how to create a mini flat gingerbread man that s just right for decorating your home or hanging on your tree the crochet pattern is written in us terms and the pdf is 6 pages long and includes plenty of progress photos to help you along **supplies** 4mm crochet hook dk weight yarn scissors sewing needle 10mm safety eyes black embroidery thread **yarn** weight dk / light worsted/ #3 brand stylecraft squeeze me dk a almond b white c pink total 31 yards **gauge** 4mm hook 2″ x 2″ swatch = 8 row of 7 single_crochet **finished size** width 10cm x height 11 5cm **abbreviations us terms ** chain chain magic_ring magic_ring r round / row single_crochet single_crochet 2sc 2 single_crochet in 1 space increase decrease single_crochet 2 together decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch st/sts stitch/stitches **skill level** easy **notes** a free basic online version of this crochet pattern is available at https //hookfully com/free-crochet-gingerbread-man-ornament-pattern/
